item.title: What’s next for agentic AI? LangChain founder looks to ambient agents
item.description: LangChain’s founder Harrison Chase is looking to advance agentic AI with the concept of ambient agents, which might well be the next step on the path ...

item.title: Colossal raises $200M to “de-extinct” the woolly mammoth, thylacine and dodo
item.description: Colossal BioSciences has raised $200 million in a new round of funding to bring back extinct species like the woolly mammoth.

item.title: Early days for AI: Only 25% of enterprises have deployed, few reap rewards
item.description: Vellum polled 1,250 AI developers to understand what’s happening in the AI trenches, including techniques, use cases and challenges.

item.title: MiniMax unveils its own open-source LLM with industry-leading 4M token context
item.description: LLM MiniMax-Text-o1 is of particular note for enabling up to 4 million tokens in its context window — equivalent to a small library.

item.title: Hallucinations in AI: How GSK is addressing a critical problem in drug development
item.description: Hallucinations are a persistent problem in healthcare. Here's how GSK is using test-time compute scaling to improve its gen AI systems.
